serviceName: AWS IAM Identity Center (successor to AWS Single Sign-On) directory

actions.name: AddMemberToGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to add a member to a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: CompleteVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration
actions.description: Grants permission to complete the creation process of a virtual MFA device

actions.name: CompleteWebAuthnDeviceRegistration
actions.description: Grants permission to complete the registration process of a WebAuthn device

actions.name: CreateAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to create an alias for the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: CreateBearerToken
actions.description: Grants permission to create a bearer token for a given provisioning tenant

actions.name: CreateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to create an External Identity Provider configuration for the directory

actions.name: CreateGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: CreateProvisioningTenant
actions.description: Grants permission to create a provisioning tenant for a given directory

actions.name: CreateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to create a user in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: DeleteBearerToken
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a bearer token

actions.name: DeleteExternalIdPCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the given external IdP certificate

actions.name: DeleteExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an External Identity Provider configuration associated with the directory

actions.name: DeleteGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a group from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: DeleteMfaDeviceForUser
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a MFA device by device name for a given user

actions.name: DeleteProvisioningTenant
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the provisioning tenant

actions.name: DeleteUser
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: DescribeDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: DescribeGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to query the group data, not including user and group members

actions.name: DescribeGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about groups from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: DescribeProvisioningTenant
actions.description: Grants permission to describes the provisioning tenant

actions.name: DescribeUser
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: DescribeUserByUniqueAttribute
actions.description: Grants permission to describe user with a valid unique attribute represented for the user

actions.name: DescribeUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: DisableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to disable authentication of end users with an External Identity Provider

actions.name: DisableUser
actions.description: Grants permission to deactivate a user in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: EnableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to enable authentication of end users with an External Identity Provider

actions.name: EnableUser
actions.description: Grants permission to activate user in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: GetAWSSPConfigurationForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the AWS IAM Identity Center Service Provider configurations for the directory

actions.name: GetGroupId
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve ID information about group from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: GetUserId
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve ID information about user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: GetUserPoolInfo
actions.description: (Deprecated) Grants permission to get UserPool Info

actions.name: ImportExternalIdPCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to import the IdP certificate used for verifying external IdP responses

actions.name: IsMemberInGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to check if a member is a part of the group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: IsMemberInGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to check if a member is a part of multiple groups in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: ListBearerTokens
actions.description: Grants permission to list bearer tokens for a given provisioning tenant

actions.name: ListExternalIdPCertificates
actions.description: Grants permission to list the external IdP certificates of a given directory and IdP

actions.name: ListExternalIdPConfigurationsForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the External Identity Provider configurations created for the directory

actions.name: ListGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to list groups from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: ListGroupsForMember
actions.description: Grants permission to list groups of the target member

actions.name: ListGroupsForUser
actions.description: Grants permission to list groups for a user from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: ListMembersInGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all members that are part of a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: ListMfaDevicesForUser
actions.description: Grants permission to list all active MFA devices and their MFA device metadata for a user

actions.name: ListProvisioningTenants
actions.description: Grants permission to list provisioning tenants for a given directory

actions.name: ListUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to list users from the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: RemoveMemberFromGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a member that is part of a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: SearchGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to search for groups within the associated directory

actions.name: SearchUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to search for users within the associated directory

actions.name: StartVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration
actions.description: Grants permission to begin the creation process of virtual mfa device

actions.name: StartWebAuthnDeviceRegistration
actions.description: Grants permission to begin the registration process of a WebAuthn device

actions.name: UpdateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to update an External Identity Provider configuration associated with the directory

actions.name: UpdateGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update information about a group in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: UpdateGroupDisplayName
actions.description: Grants permission to update group display name update group display name response

actions.name: UpdateMfaDeviceForUser
actions.description: Grants permission to update MFA device information

actions.name: UpdatePassword
actions.description: Grants permission to update a password by sending password reset link via email or generating one time password for a user in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: UpdateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to update user information in the directory that AWS IAM Identity Center provides by default

actions.name: UpdateUserName
actions.description: Grants permission to update user name update user name response

actions.name: VerifyEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to verify an email address of an User
